title: Kirsten Oswald – 2023 Comments on the Resignation Announcement of Nicola Sturgeon
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kirsten Oswald, the SNP MP for East Renfrewshire, on Twitter on 15 February 2023.
content: Nicola Sturgeon has been an outstanding leader for our country. We’ve been so fortunate to have someone with her talents at the helm. I am so sorry she is standing down.
